Class: Transactions

Transactions

A blockchain consists of an immutable set of cryptographically linked transactions. Each transaction contains one or more actions.

More info: https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/transaction-basics

new Transactions(client)

constructor - return Transactions object configured for specified Chain Core.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
client Client Configured Chain client object.

Methods

build(builderBlock [, callback])

Build an unsigned transaction from a set of actions.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
builderBlock builderCallback Function that adds desired actions to a given builder object.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
- Unsigned transaction template, or error.
Type
Promise.<Object>

buildBatch(builderBlocks [, callback])

Build multiple unsigned transactions from multiple sets of actions.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
builderBlocks Array.<builderCallback> Functions that adds desired actions to a given builder object, one per transaction.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
- Batch of unsigned transaction templates, or errors.
Type
Promise.<BatchResponse>

query(params [, callback])

Get one page of transactions matching the specified query.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
params Query {} Filter and pagination information.
callback pageCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Requested page of results.
Type
Promise.<Page>

queryAll(params, processor)

Request all transactions matching the specified query, calling the supplied processor callback with each item individually.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
params Query Filter and pagination information.
processor QueryProcessor Processing callback.
Returns:
A promise resolved upon processing of all items, or rejected on error.
Type
Promise

submit(signed)

Submit a signed transaction to the blockchain.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
signed Object A fully signed transaction template.
Returns:
Transaction ID of the successful transaction, or error.
Type
Promise.<Object>

submitBatch(signed)

Submit multiple signed transactions to the blockchain.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
signed Array.<Object> An array of fully signed transaction templates.
Returns:
- Batch response of transaction IDs, or errors.
Type
Promise.<BatchResponse>

Type Definitions

builderCallback(builder)

Processing callback for building a transaction. The instance of TransactionBuilder modified in the function is used to build a transaction in Chain Core.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
builder TransactionBuilder
